project.title: Etch a Sketch
project.intro: Try to sketch something in this!
chall: Input event to listen to every input modification
Turn string into number with parseFloat
Translate number into string with toString
Calculate the width of an element with offsetWidth

relatedLinks.title: Clock
relatedLinks.intro: Check the clock and get the time!
chall: Work with Date and its methods getHours and getMinutes
Use CSS transform to rotate the clock hands
Define the transform-origin to rotate as a real clock

relatedLinks.title: Calculator
chall: Create an element in the right location with insertAdjacentHTML
Create shadows on an element with box-shadow
